name: Trivia Beta64 Party
storyline: It's the first ever Betacon convention, a gaming convention for the famous content creator Beta64! However, the convention turns quickly into a quirky murder game, featuring a number of community members, you'll need to answer community-centric trivia to have a chance of surviving the hands of a new yet oddly familiar host!
summary: A Modification of Jackbox Games' Trivia Murder Party 2 - Inspired by the lore and community of Beta64, featuring overhauled voiceovers, music, trivia, and graphics.
